metadata.title: CVE-2021-40732 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: XMP Toolkit version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by a null pointerdereference vulnerability that could result in leaking data from certainmemory locations and causing a local denial of service in the context ofthe current user. User interaction is required to exploit thisvulnerability in that the victim will need to open a specially crafted MXFfile.

criterions.comment: exempi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
